title: Miami Spy Games: Russian Zombie Gun, Part One
description: Miami, 2012. A new gun has made its way from a Russian science lab to the streets of Miamiâ€”a gun that destroys the executive functioning power of the brain, turning people into zombie-like beings. Follow the Miami ACES team in their thrilling adventures in this new series.Written by: Armand RosamiliaCreated by: AK WatersPublisher Note: You can now purchase all 12 episodes together in one book!
